name: Extreme Motorcycle ADV Cooler
description:
This may be the best Cooler you have ever owned.  Super thick insulation with 1000 Denier exterior.  This is the 12 pack version.  Easily straps on your ADV motorcycle when full but can collapse easily for the trip home or to save space.  

Built for the outdoor enthusiast, our quality product will be there for you when you need it. Nothing keeps cool like a Polar Bear! The Polar Bear will keep ice for 24 hours in 100 degree heat and will keep hot up to 200 degrees for many hours.

Dimensions: 7"x14"x12"

Heavy duty luggage grade 1000 denier nylon outer shell.
Specialized open cell foam air trap design.
Leak proof / Sweat proof Dura-Temp liner.
Heavy duty #8 weatherized rubber-coated zipper.
Padded shoulder strap.
Side release buckles, heavy duty built to last.
Side pocket with rubber coated zipper.
Velcro wrap around handle.
Zipper pull-tab / bottle opener.
Will keep ice for at least 24 hours in 100-degree heat.

name: Osborne Stove
description:
The only camp stove you need.  Originally featured in Road Rider Magazine.  Folds flat for packing on your motorcycle or ATV.  Uses charcoal and is easily started using paper, twigs, leaves....

Google the following to see a video on setup of the Osborne Stove

"Osborne Stove for Motorcycle Camping"  find the YouTube Video

name: MotoPocket-N
description:
motoPOCKET-N "Take it All" is a removable top case organizer designed to hold your travel documents, registration, passport or maps.  It attaches to the top lid with our patent- pending Velcro-like loop pad.  Easy to remove and take into your hotel room or customs office.

Locate anywhere there is a suitable surface!

SPECIFICATIONS – motoPOCKET-N:
Dimensions:  11.5” wide x 9” tall
Fabric:            600 Denier Polyester with PVC backing black.
Zipper:           No. 8 Coil zipper; Black zipper pull with cord.


INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS, LOOP PAD & APPLICATION TOOL INCLUDED

name: Wolfman Bottle Holster
description:
Wolfman created the Wolf Bottle Holster. They worked the design around the popular Primus, Optimus, and MSR 1 liter bottles. The Bottle Holster can attach to the seat, rack or to the Wolfman Expedition Dry Saddlebags.
Works great with the Primus bottle
Constructed from heavy duty Ballistic Nylon.
4 point mounting, with a top strap that secures the bottle.
Size: 9 " long. We recommend a 1 liter/10" circumference bottle or smaller to fit in our holster.

Note:  Fuel bottle sold separate

name: Primus Fuel Bottle 1 Liter  33oz
description:
Sturdy durable aluminum. Wt. 8 oz. Dimensions: 3" diameter, 11" height.

    Dimensions: 3 in x 11.75 in
    Wt. 7.8 oz 
    durable aluminum
    Run your MSR liquid fuel stove a long time on this bottle.

name: Twisted Throttle Tool Tube
description:
Tube can be used to carry a Fuel Bottle, Water Bottle or tools.

The Twisted Throttle Tool Tube measures 14 inches long overall with a measurement of 12 inches from mounting foot tip to mounting foot tip. The tube body measures 12 inches from the base of the tube body to the cap with the foot at the opposite end of the cap extending 2 inches beyond the tube.

The tube is 4 inches wide at it's widest point with a main body diameter of 3-1/2 inches. The foot at the cap end is 3 inches wide with 3 round 8mm mounting holes while the opposite foot is 2 inches wide and has 1 elongated 8mm mounting hole.

The feet provide 3/4 of an inch clearance for the main tube and 1/2 inch at the tube's widest point.

Mounting Kit Notes: The mounting kit includes the proper size Drill Bit, Hex Head Screws, Sealing Washers and Large Exterior Washers as detailed in the Installation Instructions attached below.

Note:  Primus bottle not included.

name: MotoPocket
description:
The Glove Box for your motorcycle.

motoPOCKET is a waterproof, removable and convenient glove compartment for your motorcycle.  It attaches to the inside of your windshield with our patent pending Velcro-like loop pad. Perfect for storing your cell phone, garage door opener, eyeglass cleaner, and it's at your fingertips. 

SPECIFICATIONS - motoPOCKET:
Dimensions:  11” wide x 7” tall 
Fabric:            600 Denier Polyester with PVC backing black.
Zipper:           No. 8 Coil zipper; Black zipper pull with cord.


INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS, LOOP PAD & APPLICATION TOOL INCLUDED

name: Helmet Secure-It
description:
Secure your helmet to your motorcycle.

Lightweight and Flexible.  Vinyl coated braided steel cable.  

Choose one of our Master Locks for only 3.00 or use your own lock

name: Jacket Secure-It
description:
With our Jacket Secure-It, your Jacket will never be left vulnerable on your motorcycle.   

52" length.  Doubles as a disc lock reminder cable

Vinyl coated braided Steel cable.  

Add one of our Master padlocks for only 3.00 or use your own lock

name: Ultimate Survival Whistle by JetScream
description: Throw in your tank bag or clip on your jacket.  Up to 122db of attention getting sound.

name: Secure-It Master Lock
description:
Master Lock for use with your Helmet or Jacket Secure-It Cable

Comes with two keys.
